original: he rāmabhadra tvaṃ vivekamahāmahimnā yukte prasṛtaiḥ pallavitaiḥ sarvaiḥ
analyzed: he rāma bhadra tvam viveka mahā mahimnā yukte prasṛtaiḥ pallavitaiḥ sarvaiḥ
śānti dānti ādi guṇaiḥ abhirāme asmin pāścātya janmani prāpte sati sattvasthānām

original: jīvanmuktānāṃ karmaṇi saptamabhūmikālakṣaṇe padaṃ sthānaṃ kuru | eṣā
analyzed: jīvanmuktānām karmaṇi saptama bhūmikā lakṣaṇe padam sthānam kuru eṣā
vairāgya prakaraṇa upavarṇitā sarva jana prasiddhā ca bhava saṅga vimoha cintā tvayi
padam sthānam mā karotu iti arthaḥ

dvātriṃśat sāhastryām saṃhitāyām mokṣa upāyeṣu sthiti prakaraṇe
dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ
iti śrī vāsiṣṭha mahārāmāyaṇa tātparya prakāśe sthiti prakaraṇe dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ
sargaḥ
iti śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājaka ācārya śrīmat sarvajñasarasvatī

śrī vāsiṣṭha mahārāmāyaṇa tātparya prakāśe sthiti prakaraṇam samāptam
